titleStmt.title: The Clerks vade mecum, or, A choice collection of modern presidents according to the best forms extant, and such as have not formerly been printed : containing all sorts of bargains and sales, leases, mortgages, grants, covenants, surrenders &c. : usefull for all persons that have relation to the practick part of the common law ... / fatihfully perused by T.P.
titleStmt.author: T. P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.M. for W. Lee, D. Pakeman, and G. Bedell,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages torn and tightly bound with loss of print. Pages 220-243 and 624-645 from British Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
